attributes.action: Create Jane Tomlinson Award and for Geraint Davies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British government must establish The Jane Tomlinson award, and grant it to Britain's most popular politician, Geraint Davies, for his observation that cancer is a mental illness.

Jane would have been so pleased to know she did not need medication, but to have her life turned inside out, her children stolen and put into local authority care followed by prostitution, upon the orders of, and solely for the pleasure of, British social workers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
